wikipedia_page.main: Sacha Grunpeter was a British actor best known for his portrayal of Michael in Agony Again and Didier Baptiste in Dream Team, where he went by the name of Tom Redhill.  Shortly before his death, he also co-wrote, produced and portrayed a character in the film Tracing Cowboys.

link_mentions.page: List of comedy television series with LGBT characters
response: |Agony Again || Michael Lucas || Sacha Grunpeter ||Michael is a gay college student, who meets Will Brewer (Robert Whitson), the star of an Australian soap opera. Short-lived sequel to 1979 sitcom Agony. ||style="text-align: center;| BBC 1995
